meta.title: Intuition and Chakras: How to Increase Your Psychic Development Through Energy
meta.author: Lesley Phillips, PhD

parts.title: About the Author and Her Mission
parts.body: Lesley Phillips, PhD, is a spiritual teacher passionate about helping people tap into their intuition. Having started intuitive sessions since 1996 and teaching meditation, healing, and intuition development since 2003, she aims to bring intuition to as many as possible through her School of Intuition, radio show, mentoring sessions, and more. Formerly an environmental microbiologist and business negotiator, she believes our psychic senses are our natural communication tools. Lesley's work includes her Psychic Ability Blueprint and the Portico Soul Essence Cards, aiding others to validate their purpose and reminding them of their intuitive potential. Her spiritual novel, The Midas Tree, nurtures spiritual gifts in both children and adults.

parts.title: Intuition Blueprint and Spiritual Growth
parts.body: Intuition Blueprint is your unique map of spiritual abilities, allowing you to understand and utilize your gifts. This map offers insights about how to live your life purpose. It's crucial for self-knowledge and understanding why you may self-sabotage. Your Blueprint helps you align with your inner guidance and unleash potential previously hidden by doubts or lack of understanding. Everyone is an infinite consciousness, and by embracing your Intuition Blueprint, you can unblock and utilize your intuition to improve everyday life, replace limiting beliefs, and grow spiritually. Chakras and psychic abilities connect through your unique Intuition Blueprint, offering guidance in self-navigation. Everyone has distinct abilities linked to chakras, which foster growth and support life goals. These abilities vary, from clairvoyance to clairaudience, and understanding them in context with your chakras helps clear blocks and utilize potential. This book introduces these relationships, providing a framework in Part Two. Understanding this harmony cultivates self-awareness and empowers you to actively create your future guided by inner wisdom.

parts.title: Understanding Aura and Manifestation
parts.body: Accept your experiences as they are without resisting them. The law of attraction involves accepting responsibility for your own creations and being open to unconscious manifestations. This chapter explains the concept of aura, an energy field surrounding your body, acting as your personal creative universe. It reflects your current state of being, indicating health or emotional issues. Your intuitive awareness can help you read and heal your aura, making you a conscious creator of your reality.

parts.title: Understanding Intuition and Overcoming Misconceptions
parts.body: Intuition is a natural ability that can be accessed consciously and developed with practice, such as through meditation. Many people mistakenly believe that intuition is sporadic and only happens in sudden flashes, or that it must make logical sense when in fact, it is often subtle and doesn't always align with our logical mind. Despite this, intuition is constantly active, but external influences might sometimes dominate our attention. To truly harness intuition, you need to quiet these external influences and tune into your inner world. This can be achieved by understanding your unique intuitive style and consciously working to recognize it when it arises. Intuition can sometimes be vague, but with practice, you can learn to access it whenever you want and use it to guide you beyond the confines of logic.

parts.title: Universal Intuition and Spiritual Communication
parts.body: Everyone has intuition, regardless of being male or female. It's part of our spiritual journey and can be supportive in various spheres of life. While some claim intuition is only for special individuals, it's a gift accessible to all. Practicing intuition involves communicating with higher consciousness, your soul, and even past lives, angels, and guides. It's possible to connect with loved ones who have passed, nature, animals, and even galactic beings. The key is focusing on your intentions for developing your intuition and mastering the abilities.

parts.title: Overcoming Self-Doubt and Exploring Abstract Intuition
parts.body: Christina faced intense self-doubt about her clairvoyant abilities despite showing a gift in using her sixth chakra. Initially blocked by past invalidations, she needed encouragement to embrace her inner guidance. Over time, by releasing past experiences, Christina gained confidence and now values her abilities, planning to study energy medicine to assist others. Abstract Intuition involves understanding light, symbols, geometry without relying on the intellect. This ability can lead to being labeled as gifted or experiencing various unique skills such as musical or mathematical prodigies. Signs of abstract intuition include a passion for numbers, music, and art or seeing the world in unique ways. Nikola Tesla exemplified this with his mental experiments, highlighting the potential of accessing answers effortlessly. Abstract Intuition allows for conveying complex meanings without traditional intellectual processes.

parts.title: Third Chakra - Solar Plexus and Energy Management
parts.body: The third chakra, or solar plexus, connects physical and astral bodies to help distribute energy for our life's purpose. True power comes from owning and channeling energy authentically for our unique path. While many misuse their energy by exerting authority over others, it's important to live authentically, with respect and boundaries. Owning power means saying no to what doesn't align with your soul and standing by your beliefs. One example is Nicky, who reclaimed her power after leaving an abusive household. Misused power can manifest in feeling manipulated or like a victim. By redistributing energy wisely, we can align our free will with life's goals. Out-of-body experiences (OOBE) allow exploring consciousness beyond the physical realm, like dreams or even near-death experiences. Managing third chakra energy and dreaming awareness can aid in spiritual growth. It's vital to own and use your energy for your unique purpose in the world.

parts.title: Clairsentience and Personal Space
parts.body: Intuition involves multiple chakras working together, like mind, body, and spirit. Clairsentience allows you to communicate with your body to identify if emotions belong to you or others, helping manage empathy and energy boundaries. Meditation is key for cultivating intuition and managing clairsentience by grounding your chi. Owning personal space improves experiences and connections. Listening to your body is crucial—if not, it may react with dis-ease, manifesting negative physical or emotional health outcomes. Hyper-vigilance to emotions around you might depict discomfort from others invading personal space. Empathic individuals often confuse their own emotions with others, which meditation can clarify.

parts.title: Importance of Being Present
parts.body: This chapter emphasizes the importance of presence in mastering life purposes, chakras, and intuition. The author uses the metaphor of a journey to explain how people are often not fully present in their bodies, similar to traveling from A to B without remembering the trip. Many individuals escape their current reality to connect with higher spiritual vibrations or to avoid pain. To remain present, it's crucial to focus on the breath. Breathing techniques, such as square breathing and ascending breath, are suggested to help individuals ground themselves and connect to their physical bodies.

parts.title: Intuition Blueprint & Discovering Blocks
parts.body: Explore your Intuition Blueprint by identifying your experience and challenge in intuition. Recall and note down past intuition experiences, linking each to relevant chakras and styles. Then, review intuition challenges related to life lessons to understand how overcoming these can reveal your greatest gifts and align with your life purpose. Document this on Your Intuition Chart to visualize areas of strength or where growth is needed. Even challenges or blocks reveal focus areas for growth in your spiritual journey. Consider meditation practices from the book for overcoming these blocks, centering, and improving your intuition flow.
